# GitHub Repository Topics

This file contains suggested topics/keywords for the GitHub repository.
These should be added via GitHub repository settings to improve discoverability.

## How to Add Topics

1. Go to the repository on GitHub
2. Click "About" (gear icon) on the right side
3. Add these topics in the "Topics" section

## Suggested Topics (max 20)

### Core Technologies
- `magento2`
- `frankenphp`
- `docker`
- `docker-compose`
- `caddy`
- `php`
- `php82`
- `php83`
- `php84`

### Use Cases
- `e-commerce`
- `magento-template`
- `docker-template`
- `development-environment`
- `production-ready`

### Infrastructure
- `mariadb`
- `opensearch`
- `redis`
- `rabbitmq`
- `valkey`
- `kubernetes`

### Additional Tags
- `performance`
- `https`
- `ssl`
- `automated-deployment`
- `xdebug`
- `composer`
- `template-repository`
- `starter-template`

## Repository Description

Use this description in the "About" section:

```
Production-ready Docker template for Magento 2 with FrankenPHP - modern PHP application server with automatic HTTPS, high performance (~2500 req/s), and complete dev stack (MariaDB, OpenSearch, Redis, RabbitMQ)
```

## Website URL

If you have a documentation website or demo, add it to the "Website" field.
